text: Suomussalmi is a municipality in Kainuu, Finland. It had almost 8,700 living there in January 2014. The municipalities next to it are Taivalkoski, Puolanka, Hyrynsalmi and the cities Kuusamo, Pudasj√§rvi and Kuhmo. ==History== Suomussalmi was established in 1867. == Other websites == * The official Suomussalmi page Category:Municipalities of Kainuu Category:1867 establishments in Finland
title: Suomussalmi
